ðŸ§© Modules
==========

The core modules of **PyGamLab** provide advanced functionalities for structure generation, AI-driven
analysis, data processing, and scientific computing. Select a module below to explore its details.

.. raw:: html

    <style>
    /* ---------- Responsive Grid ---------- */
    .module-grid {
        display: grid;
        grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(230px, 1fr));
        gap: 1.4rem;
        margin-top: 2rem;
        margin-bottom: 3rem;
    }

    /* ---------- Card Base ---------- */
    .module-card {
        border-radius: 12px;
        padding: 1.2rem 1.4rem;
        text-align: center;
        transition: all 0.25s ease;
        border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
        box-shadow: 0 2px 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);
    }

    /* ---------- Light / Dark Themes ---------- */
    html[data-theme="light"] .module-card {
        background: #f9f9fb;
        color: #222;
        --border-color: #ddd;
    }

    html[data-theme="dark"] .module-card {
        background: #1f1f24;
        color: #f2f2f2;
        --border-color: #333;
    }

    .module-card:hover {
        transform: translateY(-4px);
        box-shadow: 0 4px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
        border-color: #4682f3;
    }

    /* ---------- Title and Description ---------- */
    .module-card h3 {
        font-size: 1.05rem;
        margin-top: 0.6rem;
        margin-bottom: 0.4rem;
        color: inherit;
    }

        font-size: 0.9rem;
        line-height: 1.4;
        color: inherit;
    }

    /* ---------- SVG Icon ---------- */
    .module-icon {
        width: 48px;
        height: 48px;
        margin-bottom: 0.6rem;
    }
    </style>
